SmoothZoom installed! Refresh already open tabs or restart the browser for changes to take effect.
Hi, I'm Chris and I'm the developer of this browser extension - SmoothZoom.
Here's a list of issues that cannot be solved with current browser technology:
  • <iframe> elements (nested browsing contexts). The extension code (content-script) is injected into all frames. When you start zooming inside a frame, its parent frame cannot know your cursor position. However, if you start zooming inside the parent frame, all child frames won't respond to pointer events so that the parent frame can always know your cursor position.
  • Running Page JavaScript. When you disable Website interactivity, it would be a great idea for the extension to disable page JavaScript. This is possible with Content Settings API. However, the content script will continue working, but the setTimeout function will not.
If you found a solution to any of these issues, contact me: kristijan.ros@gmail.com

Welcome to SmoothZoom!

You can access this page anytime by clicking on the SmoothZoom title from the popup.
Next to this text is the identical version of the popup, which can be accessed by clicking on the extension icon:
Use it to find settings that suit you best. They automatically sync to your browser account.
For low-end PCs or heavy websites, try making these changes in the following order:
  • Disable Always follow cursor
  • Disable Website interactivity
  • Reduce Smoothness to 0ms
  • Enable Use screenshot
